price: 53. Waxaan ka tusi doonnaa Calaamooyin- kayaga koonka iyo xagga nafahoodaba ilaa ay uga caddaato inuu (Alle, Qur’aanka) yahay Xaq. Miyuusan ku fillayn Rabbigaa inuu u jeedo wax walba oo ka yahay marag.
arabic: سَنُرِيهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا فِي ٱلۡأٓفَاقِ وَفِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَهُمۡ أَنَّهُ ٱلۡحَقُّۗ أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفِ بِرَبِّكَ أَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: sanurīhim āyātinā fī al-āfāqi wafī anfusihim ḥattā yatabayyana lahum annahu al-ḥaqu awalam yakfi birabbika annahu ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdun
